description: Lists discovered resources associated with the given MigrationTask.

parameters.name: MigrationTaskName
parameters.description: The name of the MigrationTask. Do not store personal data in this field.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: If there are more discovered resources than the max result, return the next token to be passed to the next call as a bookmark of where to start from.

nested_items.name: DiscoveredResourceList
nested_items.description: Returned list of discovered resources associated with the given MigrationTask.

nested_items.name: ConfigurationId
nested_items.description: The configurationId in Application Discovery Service that uniquely identifies the on-premise resource.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: A description that can be free-form text to record additional detail about the discovered resource for clarity or later reference.
